001package net.tvburger.jdl.linalg;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.JavaNumberTypeSupport;
004
005import java.util.function.BiFunction;
006
007public final class Vectors {
008
009    private Vectors() {
010    }
011
012    @SafeVarargs
013    public static <N extends Number> TypedVector<N> of(JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport, N... values) {
014        N[] numbers = typeSupport.createArray(values.length);
015        for (int i = 0; i < numbers.length; i++) {
016            numbers[i] = values[i];
017        }
018        return new TypedVector<>(numbers, false, typeSupport);
019    }
020
021    public static <N extends Number> TypedVector<N> zeros(JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport, int dimensions) {
022        N[] numbers = typeSupport.createArray(dimensions);
023        return new TypedVector<>(numbers, false, typeSupport);
024    }
025
026    public static TypedVector<Float> of(float... values) {
027        Float[] floats = new Float[values.length];
028        for (int i = 0; i < floats.length; i++) {
029            floats[i] = values[i];
030        }
031        return new TypedVector<>(floats, false, JavaNumberTypeSupport.FLOAT);
032    }
033
034    public static TypedVector<Double> of(double... values) {
035        Double[] doubles = new Double[values.length];
036        for (int i = 0; i < doubles.length; i++) {
037            doubles[i] = values[i];
038        }
039        return new TypedVector<>(doubles, false, JavaNumberTypeSupport.DOUBLE);
040    }
041
042    public static <N extends Number, M extends Number> TypedVector<M> convert(Vector<N> vector, JavaNumberTypeSupport<M> typeSupport) {
043        M[] numbers = typeSupport.createArray(vector.getDimensions());
044        for (int i = 0; i < vector.getDimensions(); i++) {
045            numbers[i] = typeSupport.valueOf(vector.get(i + 1).doubleValue());
046        }
047        return new TypedVector<>(numbers, vector.isColumnVector(), typeSupport);
048    }
049
050    public static TypedVector<Double> withDoublePrecision(TypedVector<Float> vector) {
051        Double[] doubles = JavaNumberTypeSupport.DOUBLE.createArray(vector.getDimensions());
052        for (int i = 0; i < vector.getDimensions(); i++) {
053            doubles[i] = (double) (float) vector.get(i + 1);
054        }
055        return new TypedVector<>(doubles, vector.isColumnVector(), JavaNumberTypeSupport.DOUBLE);
056    }
057
058    public static TypedVector<Float> withSinglePrecision(TypedVector<Double> vector) {
059        Float[] floats = JavaNumberTypeSupport.FLOAT.createArray(vector.getDimensions());
060        for (int i = 0; i < vector.getDimensions(); i++) {
061            floats[i] = (float) (double) vector.get(i + 1);
062        }
063        return new TypedVector<>(floats, vector.isColumnVector(), JavaNumberTypeSupport.FLOAT);
064    }
065
066    public static <N extends Number> TypedVector<N> squared(TypedVector<N> vector) {
067        N[] values = vector.getCurrentNumberType().createArray(vector.getDimensions());
068        for (int i = 0; i < values.length; i++) {
069            N v = vector.get(i + 1);
070            values[i] = vector.getCurrentNumberType().multiply(v, v);
071        }
072        return new TypedVector<>(values, vector.isColumnVector(), vector.getCurrentNumberType());
073    }
074
075    public static <N extends Number> TypedVector<N> squareRoot(TypedVector<N> vector) {
076        N[] values = vector.getCurrentNumberType().createArray(vector.getDimensions());
077        for (int i = 0; i < values.length; i++) {
078            N v = vector.get(i + 1);
079            values[i] = vector.getCurrentNumberType().squareRoot(v);
080        }
081        return new TypedVector<>(values, vector.isColumnVector(), vector.getCurrentNumberType());
082    }
083
084    public static <N extends Number> TypedVector<N> divide(TypedVector<N> vector, TypedVector<N> denominator) {
085        N[] values = vector.getCurrentNumberType().createArray(vector.getDimensions());
086        for (int i = 0; i < values.length; i++) {
087            values[i] = vector.getCurrentNumberType().divide(vector.get(i + 1), denominator.get(i + 1));
088        }
089        return new TypedVector<>(values, vector.isColumnVector(), vector.getCurrentNumberType());
090    }
091
092    public static <N extends Number> TypedVector<N> elementWise(TypedVector<N> vector, BiFunction<Integer, N, N> function) {
093        N[] values = vector.getCurrentNumberType().createArray(vector.getDimensions());
094        for (int i = 0; i < values.length; i++) {
095            values[i] = function.apply(i + 1, vector.get(i + 1));
096        }
097        return new TypedVector<>(values, vector.isColumnVector(), vector.getCurrentNumberType());
098    }
099}
